ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description:
Provides a means to mock a package function, i.e., temporarily substitute it for testing.
Designed as a drop-in replacement for the now deprecated 'testthat::with_mock()'
and 'testthat::local_mock()'.

Provides a means to mock a package function, i.e., temporarily substitute it for testing.
Designed as a drop-in replacement for the now deprecated 'testthat::with_mock()'
and 'testthat::local_mock()'.

name: r-mockr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.2.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mockr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mockr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mockr/mockr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 08199520c6590e19307b5e6cbfa79fbdbe0ea6ecb690957f31222d4bf8d3792d

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rlang
    - r-withr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rlang
    - r-withr

test:
  requires:
    - r-testthat
  source_files:
    - tests/
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mockr')"  # [not win]
    - $R -e "testthat::test_file('tests/testthat.R', stop_on_failure=TRUE)"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mockr')\""  # [win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"testthat::test_file('tests/testthat.R', stop_on_failure=TRUE)\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://krlmlr.github.io/mockr/
  dev_url: https://github.com/krlmlr/mockr
  doc_url: https://krlmlr.github.io/mockr/
  license: MIT
  summary: Drop-in replacement for testthat::with_mock()
  description: |
   Provides a means to mock a package function, i.e., temporarily substitute it for testing.
   Designed as a drop-in replacement for the now deprecated 'testthat::with_mock()'
   and 'testthat::local_mock()'.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - matthewfeickert
